floater.name: move_floater
floater.string: Walk Forward (press Up Arrow or W)
Walk Backwards (press Down Arrow or S)
Walk left (press Shift + Left Arrow or A)
Walk right (press Shift + Right Arrow or D)
Run Forward (press Up Arrow or W)
Run Backwards (press Down Arrow or S)
Run left (press Shift + Left Arrow or A)
Run right (press Shift + Right Arrow or D)
Fly Forward (press Up Arrow or W)
Fly Backwards (press Down Arrow or S)
Fly left (press Shift + Left Arrow or A)
Fly right (press Shift + Right Arrow or D)

button.name: turn left btn
button.tool_tip: Turn left (press Left Arrow or A)

joystick_slide.name: move left btn
joystick_slide.tool_tip: Walk left (press Shift + Left Arrow or A)

button.name: turn right btn
button.tool_tip: Turn right (press Right Arrow or D)

joystick_slide.name: move right btn
joystick_slide.tool_tip: Walk right (press Shift + Right Arrow or D)

joystick_turn.name: forward btn
joystick_turn.tool_tip: Walk forward (press up arrow or W)

joystick_turn.name: backward btn
joystick_turn.tool_tip: Walk backward (press down arrow or S)
